replies.body: Well that sucks!  I'd like to help you out, but will need more info to really understand what's happening.  When you say your computer crashes, what do you mean exactly?  Is it just the game or your whole pc?  Are there any error messages?

As soon as it jumped from champ select to the game loading(i didnt even see the loading screen) my computer got the blue screen of death.  I dont enjy this because it waste my fellow players time and mine as well. My poor LP.  No there arent error messages, or at least i didnt see one it auto restarted the computer itself before i could read it. :(
